metadata.title: CVE-2018-18873 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in JasPer 2.0.14. There is a NULL pointerdereference in the function ras_putdatastd in ras/ras_enc.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18873` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjasper-runtime - 1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1.3
libjasper1 - 1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jasper package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1.3').
